class.name: EReportingNetworkEntity
class.comment: Table to store the AQD e-Reporting network information. Mapping file: sos/ereporting/EReportingNetwork.hbm.xml

column.name: network_id
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: identifier
column.comment: The identifier of the Network, gml:identifier. Used as parameter for queries. Optional but unique

column.name: fk_identifier_codespace_id
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:identifier codespace. Optional

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the network, gml:name. Optional

column.name: fk_name_codespace_id
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:name codespace. Optional

column.name: description
column.comment: Description of the network, gml:description. Optional
